dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
Link to original Document here

Tuesday, October 09, 2007

Google, Inc.
[private]
Mountain View, CA [private]
Fax: [private]
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints

Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints:

1. The copyrighted work at issue are the following IPexpert Products:

. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S Audio Bootcamp V2.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S COD Modules
. Ipexpert - CCIE Security Audio Bootcamp V2.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE Security Lab Workbook V4.0 (CD)
. Ipexpert - CCIE Voice Audio Bootcamp V3.0
. Ipexpert - CCVP Modules
. IpExpert - CCIE VOICE Video - DVD1-7
. Ipexpert - CCIE security Workbook V1.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S LAB V60
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S Proctor guide V3.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE Voice proctor guide V4.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S V2.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S V3.0
. Ipexpert - CCIE R&S V8.1

2. The blog where my copyrighted work is published/shared on is
http://all4cisco.blogspot.com/

3. My contact information:

[private]
Vice President of Product Development - IPexpert, Inc.
[private]
China, MI [private]
[private]
[private]@ipexpert.com

4. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by
the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.

6. If I can be of further assistance, please let me know.

[private]
Vice President of Product Development - IPexpert, Inc.
A Cisco Learning Partner - We Accept Learning Credits!
Telephone: [private]
Cell:[private]
Fax: [private]
Mailto: [private]@ipexpert.com

IPexpert - The Global Leader in Self-Study, Classroom-Based, Video-on-Demand
and Audio Certification Training Tools for the Cisco CCIE R&S Lab, CCIE
Security Lab, CCIE Service Provider Lab, CCIE Voice Lab and CCIE Storage Lab
Certifications.

Converted by[private]
